page.title: 18TOURISM IN WIVELISCOMBE
page.content: For the public houses of Wiveliscombe the busiest time of the week is darts and pool nights and weekends when people have just got their wages.The White Hart,Royal Oak,Bear and Courtyard all do bed and breakfast. This attracts tourists,especially Americans,Canadians,Swedes and French. Country Fayre is a cosy little cafe cum shop in the High Street,it also does bed and breakfast(3 rooms).July August and the Christmas period are very busy ,with Saturday the busiest for general trade.The owners make the most of the food on sale,popular purchases being congress tarts,bread puddings and egg custards.Country Fayre was awarded Relais Routiers signs in 84&85.Wiveliscombe has a number of visitors either passing through on their way to their destination or using it as a base.
